title: Add product ordering page

requirements.text: Create a new order page route at '/order/:productId' that displays the selected product's details including image, name, description, and price

quotes: I want add product ordering page in this website

acceptanceCriteria: Order page is accessible via /order/:productId route
Product details (image, name, description, price) are displayed on the order page
Product data is fetched based on the productId parameter

requirements.text: Add an order form to the order page with fields for customer name, email, phone number, shipping address (street, city, postal code, country), and quantity selector

quotes: I want add product ordering page in this website

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields: name, email, phone, address fields, and quantity
Quantity selector starts at 1 and has increment/decrement buttons
All form fields have appropriate input types and validation

requirements.text: Display order summary on the order page showing selected product, quantity, unit price, and calculated total price

quotes: I want add product ordering page in this website

acceptanceCriteria: Order summary section displays product name and image
Unit price, quantity, and total price are clearly shown
Total price updates automatically when quantity changes

requirements.text: Implement form validation for the order form with error messages for invalid or missing required fields
acceptanceCriteria: Email field validates email format
Phone number field validates phone format
All required fields show error messages when empty on submit
Postal code field validates format

requirements.text: Add a 'Place Order' button that validates the form and shows a success message with order confirmation details
acceptanceCriteria: Place Order button is clearly visible and styled
Button triggers form validation before submission
Success message displays order number, product details, and delivery estimate
Form is cleared after successful order placement

requirements.text: Update the ProductCard component to change the 'Order Now' button to navigate to the order page (/order/:productId) for the specific product
acceptanceCriteria: Order Now button on ProductCard navigates to /order/:productId
Product ID is correctly passed in the URL parameter
Navigation works from all product listings (home page and products page)

requirements.text: Add navigation link to return to products page from the order page
acceptanceCriteria: Back to Products or Continue Shopping link is visible on order page
Link navigates back to /products page
Link is styled consistently with site navigation

constraints: Use TanStack Router for routing as established in App.tsx
Follow existing styling patterns with Tailwind CSS and OKLCH color tokens from index.css
Use Orbitron and Rajdhani fonts as defined in tailwind.config.js
Maintain consistent component structure with existing pages (HomePage, ProductsPage, ContactPage)
Product data should be fetched from mockProducts.ts using the existing data structure
nonGoals: Backend order persistence or database storage
User account creation or authentication for orders
